attributes.action: Acknowledge that working single people with no families often put much more into the economy than they take out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All government policy is aimed a married/co-habiting families with or without children.  Whilst they are vitally important, the government should occasionally think about single working people living on their own who contribute to tax revenues but take virtually nothing out

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
